Variables.Name: Broker__TopicName
Variables.Description: Name of the input topic to read from

Variables.Name: Redshift__AccessKeyId
Variables.Description: Access Key Id obtained from your AWS account

Variables.Name: Redshift__SecretAccessKey
Variables.Description: Secret Access Key obtained from your AWS account

Variables.Name: Redshift__Region
Variables.Description: The region of your Redshift database. E.g: us-east-1

Variables.Name: Redshift__DatabaseName
Variables.Description: The Redshift database to push data to

Variables.Name: Redshift__ClusterIdentifier
Variables.Description: Redshift cluster identifier when connecting to a cluster.

Variables.Name: Redshift__DbUser
Variables.Description: Database user (required when connecting to a cluster).
